body.name: Mini Projector 7500Lumens Portable Projector Full HD 1080P Supported, Home Theater Projector Compatible with TV Stick, Phone, Games, HDMI, AV

features: Portable Design: Mini projector is lightweight and compact for easy portability and use on the go.
High Brightness: Produces a bright 7500 lumen image for vivid home theater and gaming experiences.
Full HD 1080P Support: Compatible with TV sticks, phones, games, and HDMI devices for a seamless viewing experience.
Long Battery Life: Uses a 2400 mAh battery for up to 50,000 hours of use between charges.
Versatile Mounting: Tabletop or ceiling mount allows for flexible positioning and viewing angles.
body.description: Upgrade Video Projector Full HD 1080P Supported Upgrade LED Projector Max Support 1920x1080 resolution, 1080P FULL HD videos are all supported. 2022 Upgrade Brightness This mini projector has improved the brightness up to 50% to satisfy our customers new needs. You can enjoy the big size movie happily with your family. 3800:1 Contrast Ratio This Movie Projector adopted the latest 3800:1 contrast ratio. No matter for movies or video games, it will offer the best image quality to you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Happy Movie Time This Mini Projector has upgraded the brightness to meet customers needs. It can work prefectly with USB/SD/HDMI/AV. No matter where you are, no matter what device you have, just choose our Video Projector to project the great display image for your happy family movie nights. Fun Video Games Max support 170" display size, with this, you don't need the expensive TVs but can enjoy your video games on the big and clear display easily. Start to enjoy the large game views now by choosing this home theater projector. Portable Smartphone Connection You can use a lightning to HDMI/USB adapter to connect your smartphone freely to our projector. If your phone is Android system, then use a micro USB/ Type c adapter to connect it to our projector. (Note: Adapter is not included in the package.)

Upgrade Video Projector Full HD 1080P Supported Upgrade LED Projector Max Support 1920x1080 resolution, 1080P FULL HD videos are all supported. 2022 Upgrade Brightness This mini projector has improved the brightness up to 50% to satisfy our customers new needs. You can enjoy the big size movie happily with your family. 3800:1 Contrast Ratio This Movie Projector adopted the latest 3800:1 contrast ratio. No matter for movies or video games, it will offer the best image quality to you. Product Specification Brightness: 7500Lumens Contrast Ratio: 3800:1 Max Support Resolution: 1920x1080 Diaplay Size: 30"-170" Display Technology: LCD Light Source: LED Lamp Life: 50,000 Hours

Multimedia LED Projector Daily TV Projector LED projector can easily connected with your Daily TV Stick. You can enjoy the TV show at the largest 170" display. The ideal distance is 3M at the display of 120". Smartphone Connection Supported For smartphone connection, you can use a lightning to HDMI adapter or Android to HDMI adapter to connect your smartphone to the projector. (Note: Adapter not included in the package.) Video Games Supported You can connect your video games easily to the projector by HDMI cable with LCD display technology. You can protect your eyes well while enjoy the full screen views. Dual Fan Cooling System It's also equiped with dual fan cooling system. You don't need to worry about the noisy sounds anymore. For great sounds, we have the duty to make you enjoy it silently and perfectly.

Your Own Home Theater Dual Built-in Stereo Speaker This Portable Projector is built in with 2 stereo speakers to ensure our customers can enjoy the great sound quality from movies and music. 170 Inch Large Screen View This LED Projector's Projection display is 32”-170” at the distance of 1M - 4M. To get the better display image, we recommend you to project at 120" in dark. Anywhere & Anytime Projection projector supports to be used with the universal tripod stand or mounted to your ceiling. Just enjoy the happiness movie night anytime and anywhre with your family. Professional Support No matter what problem you met while you use our projector, you can always get a timely and professional support. Don't hesitate, just order to have your own home theater now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little projector for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Our family is thrilled about the theater like experience this projector offers. It is easy to use and provides a nice picture on a huge screen.Perfect projector for our family's use!The value is there for the price but be realistic on your sharpness and resolution expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars relatively easy to use but I'd use external audio
reviews.reviewText: use a speaker but its good for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t come with a screen- Port are too close
reviews.reviewText: It came with no projector screen even though other customers reported receiving one and no proper additions to attach it to your phone or tablet so you can play it off there. Really a waste of time if you don’t have a laptop and thought you could use your phone with an adapter that it doesn’t have. Black mark when trying to project and a bad annoying fan sound. Not worth it. Save your money.UPDATE:So in my previous review I was unsatisfied with the projector I received. The company actually reached out to me to resolve the issue and took it upon themselves to replace the projector with an upgraded one. It came in less than 2 days. It still doesn’t come with a screen but it did come with a projector stand and a lens cover that the previous one did not. The only thing I would say that’s a con is that the usb and hdmi port are way too close to each other and it’s hard to plug in both at the same time since it’s so close. You have to push them in really hard at an angle which can cause damage to the port. That’s why I gave it at 4 stars. It’s also Bluetooth but I haven’t used that feature yet so idk what it can be used for. Overall cool projector but they need to add space in between the ports or at least add a second usb. The quality of the projector is very clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Rattling inside, wont focus
reviews.reviewText: I can hear a rattling sound inside, never a good sign. The keystone wheel has a very small degree of rotation (it seems broken), the image wont focus completely, either the top of the image is in focus or the bottom, not both. Also it won’t sit level with the tilt screw, it leans to the back and left on a level surface. Not my first cheap projector, first one I had problems with though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Set up was very quick and simple. My grandson is using it with his Xbox. Got it up and running in less than 20 minutes. The video and audio quality are top notch. Highly recommend this projector

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 9 months later, large discolored spot
reviews.reviewText: While it's worked wonderfully the whole time, I use it daily and sometimes fall asleep with videos going. It doesn't have a "sleep after X amount of time without video in" feature, so the LED screen within started to go funny is about six months.I've moved it around a lot, particularly inside to out for movie night. Since it's small and easy to set up, it's easy to move around.If not for the lack of turn off after idle time, this would be 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The sound is a little hard if you’re thinking about sharing. But I am obsessed with this!!! It’s in my bedroom and I put on nature docs for me and my pups. I feel like I’m in an aquarium 😍💻📽️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was conned with this projector I paid £79 for it when I could of bought the exact same 1 for £36 off another site ,they didn't send the 1 I ordered very poor sound ,picture not great quite blurred you can't focus it to be clear ,also I was supposed to get a free projector screen which I never received, don't buy from this seller waste of time and waste of money be warned
